## [Trainings]{.theme-white} {background-image=images/lavender.png background-size=cover}

<br>

::: {.panel-tabset}

### June 

- "**Foundations of Reproducible Research Methodology**".

- A five days residential **summer school** to introduce the worlds of research and data science.

### September 

- "**R for Beginners**"

- A five days residential **bootcamp** to teach the R programming language.

![](images/summer-school-students-july24.jpeg){width=70% fig-align=center}

### December

- "**Statistics using R**"

- A five days residential **winter school** to teach statistics.

![](images/flyer-winter.png){width=25% fig-align=center}

### March 

- "**Publish using Data Science Tools**"

- A five days residential **bootcamp** to teach quarto, latex, R, GitHub to publish reports, papers, books, websites and blogs.

:::
